sentences.en: Capacitors with round or ellipse carapace and bolt under bottom can all be tested.
sentences.cn: 外壳为圆形或椭圆、底部带螺栓的电容器均可测试.

sentences.en: Carapace of red mouth of pigeon pointed tip, white goose music Xiang Xiangtian song.
sentences.cn: 白鸽尖尖红嘴壳, 白鹅曲项向天歌.

sentences.en: Every crustacean has a layer of shell, which is also called the carapace.
sentences.cn: 甲壳动物体外都有一层几丁质外壳, 称为甲壳.

sentences.en: He said and pulled his head into his carapace.
sentences.cn: 说着,乌龟边把头缩进它的壳子里了.

sentences.en: He tickled gently at its glossy carapace,but the stubborn beetle would not budge.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地搔着甲虫光滑的壳，但这只固执的甲虫就是不动。

sentences.en: Main compositions Sour orange , tuckahoe, carapace element, fat - removing saponin etc.
sentences.cn: 主要成份:代代花, 茯苓, 甲壳素, 清脂皂素等.

sentences.en: Old Beijing is in exuviate carapace, although the wall Imperial Palace still is of bricks red.
sentences.cn: 老北京在蜕壳, 尽管故宫的墙还是砖红色的.

sentences.en: The arrogance became his protective carapace.
sentences.cn: 这种傲慢态度成了他的保护壳。

sentences.en: The Christmas Island red crabs'carapace is round shouldered and encloses their lungs and gills.
sentences.cn: 圣诞岛红蟹的甲壳和圆形的肩甲包裹着它们的肺和鳃.

sentences.en: The tortoise pulled its head into his carapace.
sentences.cn: 乌龟把头缩进它的壳里。

trans.tran_en: a hard shell on the outside of some animals such as a  crab  or  tortoise
